alternate_methods:
###Post
To order certificates by post, complete the application form and send it to the General Register Office. The address is on the form.

$D [Download 'Application form for commemorative marriage certificates' (PDF, 264KB)](http://www.dwp.gov.uk/advisers/claimforms/sf200_print.pdf "Download 'Application form for commemorative marriage certificates' (PDF, 264KB)"){:rel="external"} $D

###Registry offices
You can also order certificates from the [local register office](/register-offices "local register office") where the marriage was registered.
introduction: Register on the General Register Office website to buy a special certificate to mark a silver (25th), ruby (40th), golden (50th) or diamond (60th) wedding anniversary. Certificates cost £23.40.
more_information:
Your original marriage details are printed on a specially designed certificate and mounted in a presentation box.

You'll need to place your order at least 10 working days before the date you need it.
overview: Order a commemorative marriage certificate for a gift or keepsake to mark a silver, ruby, golden or diamond wedding anniversary
title: Order a commemorative marriage certificate

table.text: Available in England and Wales only
